title: Fitness page re-design
content:
I'm currently re-designing a fitness and workout section in a magazine and need some font ideas.  
Will probably be teamed with DIN as body and subheads. Can be vaguely retro inspired to compliment the modern cut of DIN or something just as modern but different enough.  
Don't really want anything to flimsy or serify (Slab serif is OK), but needs to give the feeling of working out and sporty.

Any ideas?
author: scotchio
